price: 59 L’Heure sonnera inéluctablement, mais la plupart des hommes ne croient pas en son avènement.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلسَّاعَةَ لَأٓتِيَةٞ لَّا رَيۡبَ فِيهَا وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَ ٱلنَّاسِ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: inna al-sāʿata laātiyatun lā rayba fīhā walākinna akthara al-nāsi lā yu'minūna
